title: Users List Endpoint
description: GET endpoint at /users that fetches all users with their preferences and metadata for user management.

title: User Data Fetching
description: Fetches all users from Appwrite database and prepares them for frontend display.

title: Data Transformation
description: Transforms user data to ensure preferences and metadata are properly formatted as JSON strings.

title: Error Handling
description: Comprehensive error handling with proper status codes for failed user fetches.
